mapper.sql: id, name, num, address, deliver_name, deliver_phone, school_id
mapper.select: SELECT bd.id, bd.name, #{id} book_id, count(nnn.id) amount FROM bk_district bd LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM bk_dealed_book WHERE selled=0 AND rented=0 AND book_id=#{id}) nnn on bd.id=nnn.district_id GROUP BY bd.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bk_district (name, num, address, deliver_name, deliver_phone, school_id) VALUES (#{name},#{num},#{address}, #{deliverName},#{deliverPhone},#{schoolId})
mapper.update: UPDATE bk_district SET name=#{name}, num=#{num}, address=#{address}, deliver_name=#{deliverName}, deliver_phone=#{deliverPhone}, school_id=#{schoolId} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE bk_district SET status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
